# devflow Documentation Index

> Go library for AI-powered development workflows: git operations, Claude CLI integration, transcript management, artifact storage.

## Quick Start
- CLAUDE.md (180 lines) - Project overview, quick reference
- docs/OVERVIEW.md (300 lines) - Vision, core components, use cases

## Architecture
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md (400 lines) - System design, type definitions
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md (400 lines) - Complete public API

## By Component

### Git Operations
- CLAUDE.md#git-operations - Quick examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#git-operations - Full API

### Claude CLI
- CLAUDE.md#claude-cli - Quick examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#claude-cli - Full API

### Transcripts
- CLAUDE.md#transcripts - Quick examples
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md#transcript-storage - Storage format
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#transcript-management - Full API

### Artifacts
- CLAUDE.md#artifacts - Quick examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#artifact-management - Full API

### flowgraph Integration
- CLAUDE.md#integration-with-flowgraph - Node examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#pre-built-workflow-nodes - Available nodes
